alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Linn, northeastern Iowa, southeastern Benton and northwestern Johnson Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norway, or 8 miles northeast of Marengo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Fairfax, Ely, Walford, Swisher, Shueyville, Norway, Amana, Middle Amana, South Amana, West Amana, Cou Falls, East Amana, Watkins, High Amana, Cedar Rapids Municipal Airport, Twin View Heights, and Sandy Beach Camp Ground. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 6 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
